title: TUESDAY - NFL REACTION TO DEREK CHAUVIN VERDICT
itunes:title: TUESDAY - NFL REACTION TO DEREK CHAUVIN VERDICT
description:
NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell (0:07) releases a statement after the conviction of former Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin in the death of George Floyd. Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin (0:39) staying in the Steel City. The NFL draft is just over a week away, and we get a little insight into the Giants (0:53) and Browns (1:51) on draft night. Plus, Bills GM Brandon Beane (1:12) talks about signing Josh Allen to a long-term deal

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
